text: "Please Please Please" is a song by American singer Sabrina Carpenter from her sixth studio album Short n' Sweet (2024). It was released through Island Records on June 6, 2024. The song became popular and had positive reviews from critics. "Please Please Please" peaked at the top of the Billboard Hot 100, becoming her first number-one single on the chart. ==References== Category:Sabrina Carpenter songs Category:2024 songs
title: Please Please Please (Sabrina Carpenter song)
